text: Apani bale dinah amara ki allaha byatita emana bastuke ahabana karaba, ye amadera upakara karate pare na ebam ksati'o karate pare na ebam amara ki pascatpade phire yaba, erapara ye, allaha amaderake patha pradarsana karechena? Ai byaktira mata, yake sayatanara banabhumite bipathagami kare diyeche-se udabhranta haye ghoraphera karache. Tara sahacarara take pathera dike deke balacheh asa, amadera kache. Apani bale dinah niscaya allahara patha'i supatha. Amara adista hayechi yate sbiya palanakarta ajnabaha haye ya'i.
